title: Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 Business 10.1.25.772
description:
Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 Business 10.1.25.772 x86x64





Paragon Hard Disk Manager Business Edition is designed to meet the needs of small businesses, with no or limited IT personnel. It offers server support and flexible Technician Licensing options for professionals managing small groups of co-located servers.


A unified, cost-effective solution for small business!

- Innovative backup imaging technology (pVHD, VHD, VMDK)
- One integrated and comprehensive solution for backup and disaster recovery, migration and data management
- Proven in millions of installations worldwide
- Never before at this price: image- and file-based backup, bare-metal recovery to dissimilar hardware, migration, partitioning and wiping for physical servers and workstations
- Strong collection of Paragon Technologies: Drive Backup, Drive Copy, Partition Manager and Disk Wiper included
- Supports Windows 10 and Windows Server 2012 R2


Key & New Features:

- Windows 10 Support
- Embedded Recovery Media Builder 3.0
- File-level backup/restore for virtual containers (pVHD, VHD, VHDX, VMDK)
- Improved Export VD Container Wizard
- Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) support
- System state data backup support
- Wiping SSD
- Wipe reports auto-save option
- Agentless protection of Hyper-V guest machines
- Revised Graphical User Interface (GUI)




Supported Technologies and Operating Systems

Support for any Windows OS since XP SP3 including the latest Windows 8.1 and Windows Server 2012 R2
Support of GPT/uEFI configurations to successfully clone, migrate, or restore a 64-bit Windows system configured to the uEFI-based boot mode; to fix uEFI related boot problems
Support for SSDs and AFDs (2TB+, non-512B sector size)
Support for GPT (GUID Partition Table) disks
Support for Microsoft dynamic disks
Support for Apple Boot Camp configurations
Microsoft Storage Spaces support
BitLocker support




Installaltion:

Unpack and Apply Patch.bat.
Install Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 Business.
